description:
The cool-season lawn DIY duo

Revitalize your cool-season lawn with our Fescue Grass Patch Kit—designed for quick lawn repair and nourishment for healthy, green lawns.

This cool-season lawn repair kit includes Bare Repair Sun & Shade with grass seed, nitrogen, and mulch, to repair thinning and bare spots with ease. Combined with Lawn Vitality Liquid Fertilizer, it promotes strong growth and improves soil health. This combination encourages fast spring recovery while growing healthy and lush all season long.

Grow greener, healthier lawns right from the start with Sunday's sustainable lawn care solutions.

sections.kit_benefits:
Complete grass patch repair fast-growing seed with nutrients for lawn recovery
Enhances growth and greening liquid fertilizer formulated for grass and soil health
Climate-resilient grass seed A-LIST certified fine fescue and perennial ryegrass mix
Zero pesticides fertilizer and lawn repair made without harsh chemicals
Made for cool-season lawns in northern and transitional zones
Up to 3,000 sq. ft. coverage made for small to medium-sized lawns
sections.whats_included:
2 Bare Repair Sun & Shade Lawn Treatment: Premium cool-season seed mix, mulch, and nutrients for effective patch repair. Covers up to 65 sq. ft. per container.
1 Lawn Vitality Liquid Fertilizer pouch: Liquid lawn fertilizer for growth, greening, and soil support. Covers up to 3,000 sq. ft.
sections.instructions:
For the best results, apply in moderate temperatures between 50 and 85 degrees F.
Attach the hose-end sprayer to the pouch, and apply Lawn Vitality fertilizer uniformly across your lawn according to the label. Allow the fertilizer to dry fully before doing anything else to the lawn.
Lightly rake patchy areas, ensuring seed-to-soil contact for optimal growth of the grass seed. Seed Bare Repair according to the recommended seeding rate on the package.
Water the seeded areas regularly, up to 1-2 times daily, to maintain consistent soil moisture and aid seed germination.
Once 60% of the grass starts growing, apply any remaining fertilizer to support continued growth and lawn health.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
When is the best time to apply this kit?
For the best results, apply Lawn Vitality liquid fertilizer in temperatures between 50 and 85 degrees F, typically in the early morning or evening.
Seed Bare Repair Sun & Shade when daily temperatures consistently hold between 55-75 degrees F, usually in the spring and fall.
Can I use this kit alongside other Sunday lawn products?
Yes, the kit can be effectively used with other Sunday lawn care products. Lawn Vitality can be used in combination with your Custom Lawn Plan or other nutrients, just allow 4-6 weeks between nutrient applications. If using weed control, apply before seeding for best results.
When is it safe for people and pets to go on the lawn after applying the kit?
It's safe to return to the lawn after the liquid fertilizer and seeded areas have dried. However, for optimal results, especially for seed germination, limiting traffic on the newly seeded areas is recommended until the grass is established.
When will I see results?
Bare Repair Sun & Shade usually takes 14 days to germinate but may take more or less time pending conditions. Typically, fertilizers offer 4-6 weeks of growth and results are visible within hours to days.
Bare Repair Instructions
Our cutting-edge formula has all the bare essentials (and then some) to thicken up thin spots, stimulate growth, and get green grass where nothing else has worked. This unique blend contains premium grass seed, slow-release nitrogen to feed new growth, and recycled paper mulch to hold in much-needed moisture. Ready to get growing?
